templates.name: Claudecode/deepseek / Anthropic (Claude) CLI
templates.description: Environment variables for using claudecode-style CLI with Anthropic or Deepseek Anthropic proxy

variables.description: Anthropic API key (used by claudecode / CLI). Do NOT commit the real key.
Base URL for Anthropic or proxy endpoint (e.g., Deepseek). Adjust to provider. https://api.deepseek.com/anthropic
Default model to use with the CLI (e.g., deepseek-chat, claude-2)
Path to local claudecode CLI config (optional)
Optional claudecode profile name to select (if CLI supports profiles)
Default request timeout for claudecode CLI (milliseconds)
